__e: And with Sherry gone and the baby...
- You don't remember where we put that Sherry, dear?
Fine, just took Mom five minutes before she left the room in tears.
- Sherrie's cool with you staying here?
Sherry told me all about you.
It's Sherry Palmer. She wants to come here in five minutes.
And this is the voice file we have on record which will prove that it is, in fact, Sherry Palmer.
Sherry Palmer and whoever else she's involved with in this won't leave there alive.
You'll have one sherry and remember it all.
And as for Sherry and me? You've had a front-row seat today. You know it's notgood.
I'm surprised you ain't got Sherry and the kids up in here working.
